text: Aur jab inn ko hukum diya gaya kay tum log iss aabadi mein jaa ker raho aur khao uss say jiss jagah tum raghbat kero aur zaban say yeh kehtay jana kay tauba hai aur jhukay jhukay darwazon mein dakhil hona hum tumhari khatayen moaf ker den gay. Jo log nek kaam keren gay unn ko mazeed baran aur den gay
